contextInfo.title: Editing multiple accounts using the Import function

content.code:
To edit multiple accounts using the import function:

  1. Click on the Import Accounts button.
  2. Choose the option to Export and Re-import.
  3. The Import Wizard will take you through the process step-by-step until you have successfully edited your student accounts.

Prefer to see it in action? Show me how...

Need more detail? Tell me how...
